entry.dcterms:description: social status and life style of house owners, the amount of individual resources used in the construction, dwelling and home building history

social welfare policy and systems
housing
social and occupational mobility
family life, marriage, relationship
agriculture
person
survey data
cross-section
Random sample of one-third of the owners of large houses (with big ground-space or with more than one floor) built after 1975 in the settlements of Hajdúnánás and Nagykálló.
data collection with questionnaire
A
